items.content_html: ReactRoutify is a lightweight and flexible React routing library that simplifies routing and navigation in React applications. With support for TypeScript, it provides an easy-to-use API for handling routing needs.
items.title: archinmodi/react-routify: ReactRoutify is a lightweight and flexible React routing library that simplifies routing and navigation in React applications. With support for TypeScript, it provides an easy-to-use API for handling routing needs.

items.content_html: Full-featured, lightweight Postgres databases for local development.
items.title: YoussefKababe/pgquick: Full-featured, lightweight Postgres databases for local development.

items.content_html: Codio is a lightweight, intuitive code editor built with ReactJS, featuring real-time code preview and a sleek, minimalistic interface. Designed for developers who want a distraction-free coding environment, Codio supports syntax highlighting, multiple file tabs, and integrates seamlessly with popular CSS and JavaScript libraries.
items.title: brijesh-py/codio: Codio is a lightweight, intuitive code editor built with ReactJS, featuring real-time code preview and a sleek, minimalistic interface. Designed for developers who want a distraction-free coding environment, Codio supports syntax highlighting, multiple file tabs, and integrates seamlessly with popular CSS and JavaScript libraries.

items.content_html: Accessible & Lightweight Components Library for React apps
items.title: merely-ui/merely-ui: Accessible & Lightweight Components Library for React apps

items.content_html: A lightweight wrapper over fetch with zero race conditions by default, and everything you'd yearn for in a fetching library like timeouts, retries, interceptors and so much more
items.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A lightweight wrapper over fetch with zero race conditions by default, and everything you'd yearn for in a fetching library like timeouts, retries, interceptors and so much more

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: Glin-Profanity is a lightweight and efficient npm package designed to detect and filter profane language in text inputs across multiple languages. Whether you’re building a chat application, a comment section, or any platform where user-generated content is involved, Glin-Profanity helps you maintain a clean and respectful environment.
items.title: GLINCKER/glin-profanity: Glin-Profanity is a lightweight and efficient npm package designed to detect and filter profane language in text inputs across multiple languages. Whether you’re building a chat application, a comment section, or any platform where user-generated content is involved, Glin-Profanity helps you maintain a clean and respectful environment.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: Sweet Modal React is a lightweight, customizable modal library for React applications. It provides an easy-to-use API for showing modals while allowing full customization of the modal's appearance and behavior.
items.title: hicones/sweet-modal: Sweet Modal React is a lightweight, customizable modal library for React applications. It provides an easy-to-use API for showing modals while allowing full customization of the modal's appearance and behavior.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
